about_the_game:
Welcome to the World of Exploration and Combat on the High Seas!

Age Of Privateer is a real-time card battle, roguelike deck-building game. Combine various cards to create powerful decks and explore the vast oceans. Use your courage and wit to defeat pirates, uncover hidden secrets, and embark on a quest to find ancient treasures.

Among the crowd, the herald of Emperor Albertross III reads a proclamation loudly: rewards of wealth and honor await those who find the legendary treasure. Hearing this, you decide to embark on an adventure to find the legendary treasure. Sail the vast seas, uncover hidden secrets, and claim ancient treasures.

real-time Card Battles


Age Of Privateer boasts a fast-paced and thrilling real-time card battle system. Make immediate strategic decisions and use powerful combos to defeat your enemies.

battles With Various Sea Monsters


As you navigate the vast oceans, you will encounter various sea monsters. Face enemies with unique abilities and patterns, and experience the thrill of battle.

collecting Cards and Treasures


During your voyage, collect various cards to strengthen your deck. Discover treasures and rare items to become an even more powerful warrior. Utilize diverse strategies to find the legendary treasure and claim the Emperor's rewards of wealth and honor.

name: Age Of Privateer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 980Ti

short_description: Age of Privateer is a real-time card battle-based roguelike deck-building game. Combine various cards to create a powerful deck and explore the vast seas. Can you uncover the secrets hidden in the ocean and find the ancient treasure?
